title: Major train fault causing delays on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #PayaLebar and #DhobyGhaut/#MarinaBay are now running normally.
[CCL] UPDATE: Train services have resumed. Trains and platforms are crowded.
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 20mins additional travelling time between #PayaLebar and #DhobyGhaut/#MarinaBay. We are working to recover service.
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time between #PayaLebar and #DhobyGhaut/#MarinaBay due to train fault.
[CCL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time between #Stadium and #DhobyGhaut/#MarinaBay in both directions due to train fault.
